about_first_row_text.label: About First Row Text
about_first_row_text.default: INTOGADGETS INC. is a telecom vendor committed in selling best brand with advance technology in terms of mobile gadgets. It was formally established in the year 2008 following the success of its partner company. Intogadgets derive from a word “IN-TO” which means expressing movement or action with a result surrounded by something, which actually described to the people behind the success of Intogadgets over the year, it is being managed and own by young professionals with extensive knowledge in their own fields having more than 15 years’ experience in mobile industry in terms of retail and wholesale distribution and not to mention it’s recognition from a respective leading brand in the region. Which makes Intogadgets as one of the most competitive mobile phone traders.

about_second_row_text.label: About Second Row Text
about_second_row_text.default: The company has extensive know how and a proven track record of over 10 years in telecommunications market, serving its renowned customers in over 20 stores located in all leading malls in GMA area, North Luzon, South Luzon and continue to expand more and be known nationwide.  Following global trend when it comes to online selling, Intogadgets Inc. has launched its unique online selling just early this year. Its customers based consist of low to high end users from public to private personality and aspiring young businessman.

about_third_row_text.label: About Third Row Text
about_third_row_text.default: Intogadgets provide only but certified local and branded mobile handset. Each store is considered a one stop shop with fashionable accessories and entrusted by well-known brand to be their partner in terms of after sales service.

about_objective_description.label: About Objective Description
about_objective_description.default: The company focuses on the following target markets that will provide us with the greatest market penetration, the specialty business users, the general business users, and the personal users. We intend to offer products and service packages that are priced appropriately for each segment and will offer the services that best suit each segment’s needs.

about_mission_description.label: About Mission Description
about_mission_description.default: We are realistically to continuously provide quality products and rapid services through extensive marketing approach that will strengthen our relationship with traders as partners in promoting mobile phones and accessories to the fast growing industry of telecommunication.

about_vision_description.label: About Vision Description
about_vision_description.default: We aim to provide an efficient product, services and customer satisfaction in a lucrative way of distribution

career_intro_description.default: Intogadgets is changing how millions of people Nation wide Engage in Smartphones and other gadgets. Your work will help tens of hundred of mobile phone to be sold.

career_job_quote.default: Working here is very challenging. But you'll absolutely love it.
